alert.note: Alert for Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 9:12AM MST until December 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of blowing and drifting snow will return by evening. Winds could gusts as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibility to under 2 miles at times. Drifting snow will make travel on rural roads difficult. Strong crosswinds will make travel for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold air has moved into the Big Timber area this morning temporarily ending the strong west winds. However, strong west winds and the threat of significant blowing snow is expected to return by tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
